text: My videli, chto ty obrashchal litse svoye k nebu; a teper' My povelevayem tebe obrashchat'sya k suprotivi, kotoruyu ty lyubish'. Tak obrashchay litse tvoye k zapretnoy mecheti; i vy, gde by ni byli, obrashchayte vashi litsa k ney. Te, kotorym dano Pisaniye, znayut, chto eto istina ot Gospoda ikh. Bog ne ostavlyayet bez vnimaniya togo, chto delayut oni
